About Plant Wonders

Welcome to Plant Wonders!

Plant Wonders is a fun, educational website designed to introduce children to the amazing world of plants. Our mission is to inspire a love for nature and help young minds understand the importance of plants in our world.

Through colorful illustrations, simple explanations, and engaging activities, we hope to spark curiosity and encourage children to explore the plant kingdom both online and in their own backyards!

About the Creator

Hi there! I'm Regina Trevs, the creator of Plant Wonders. I'm a student with a passion for both web development and plants. I created this website as a project for my MTM6407 course at Algonquin College.

My love for plants began when I was a child, tending to my grandmother's garden. I believe that connecting children with nature at an early age helps them develop a sense of wonder and responsibility for our environment.

I hope this website inspires kids (and adults too!) to learn more about the plant world and maybe even start growing some green friends of their own!
